title: Omega squad teemo shroom doesn't have a picture
body:
When you click on the shroom it shows a blue square in the top left of the screen. I bet this is a bug and I hope it'll be fixed soon because it IS a legendary skin.

Edit: and also when you load into the game, you don't go invisible, but you do pull out your knife.

replies.body: Hey SpottedDog, thanks for the report- we'll take a look into this!
Update! This was for all Teemo shrooms, and we have a fix!
